messages.message: ah, what a long message :smiling_face_with_tear: with the important part coming in right at the very end. `(ModelServiceException(...)... (StatusCode.RESOURCE_EXHAUSTED)'` - this comes up when there are too many concurrent calls to model service (in this case calling ibllm) for the model service pod to handle. How consistently does it come up? If you're able to scale up model-service by maybe a pod, does that get rid of the errors?
Will try to scale up model service
Will increase file size limits and pods
Scaling up the number of pods shouldn’t be necessary. This particular `RESOURCE_EXHAUSTED` error is due to file size limits that we have added. Bumping it up should resolve the errors.
That has been done and now we are running into more resource exhausted errors
Ok, I assume your other post (https://instabase.slack.com/archives/C01N7DV1137/p1695738434950129) is about those errors. I’ll take a look asap. Let’s move the conversation there.
